mapper.select: SELECT A.name AS appName, A.version AS version, A.tips AS tips, A.publishtime AS publishtime FROM t_app A LEFT OUTER JOIN t_app_publish B ON A.id=B.app_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_pos C ON B.pos_id=C.id WHERE A.application_id=#{applicationId} AND A.version <> #{version} AND (A.publish_range=1 OR A.publish_range=2 AND C.imei=#{imei}) ORDER BY A.publishtime DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT A.session_id FROM t_pos_monitor A LEFT OUTER JOIN t_pos B ON A.pos_id=B.id WHERE B.imei = #{imei} LIMIT 1
